# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ± Kitty Terminal Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Fontes
font_family FiraCode Nerd Font
bold_font FiraCode Nerd Font Bold
italic_font FiraCode Nerd Font Italic
bold_italic_font FiraCode Nerd Font Bold Italic
font_size 12.0

# Ligaduras e Cursor
disable_ligatures never
cursor_shape block
cursor_blink_interval 0.5
cursor_beam_thickness 1.5
cursor_underline_thickness 1.5

# Cursor Trail Effect
cursor_trail_step 0.5
cursor_trail_decay 0.1 0.4

# Scrollback
scrollback_lines 10000
scrollback_pager less --chop-long-lines --RAW-CONTROL-CHARS +INPUT_LINE_NUMBER

# Layouts
enabled_layouts tall:bias=70;fat:bias=70;grid;stack;split

# Tab Bar
tab_bar_edge bottom
tab_bar_style powerline
tab_powerline_style slanted
tab_title_template "{index}:{fmt.bold}{title}"
active_tab_font_style bold
inactive_tab_font_style normal

# Background & Opacity
background_opacity 0.90
dynamic_background_opacity yes

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Catppuccin Mocha Color Palette
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

foreground #cdd6f4
background #1e1e2e

cursor #f5e0dc
cursor_text_color #1e1e2e

selection_foreground #1e1e2e
selection_background #cba6f7

url_style #89b4fa

# ANSI Colors
color0  #45475a
color1  #f38ba8
color2  #a6e3a1
color3  #f9e2af
color4  #89b4fa
color5  #f5c2e7
color6  #94e2d5
color7  #cdd6f4

# Bright Colors
color8  #585b70
color9  #f38ba8
color10 #a6e3a1
color11 #f9e2af
color12 #89b4fa
color13 #f5c2e7
color14 #94e2d5
color15 #bac2de

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ–¼ï¸ Window & Borders
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

window_margin_width 8
window_padding_width 8
window_border_width 2
draw_minimal_borders yes

active_border_color #cba6f7
inactive_border_color #45475a
bell_border_color #f38ba8

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Modifiers
kitty_mod ctrl+shift

# Splits
map kitty_mod+v split_window --vertical
map kitty_mod+s split_window --horizontal

# Layouts
map kitty_mod+next_layout next_layout

# Resize
map kitty_mod+> change_font_size all +2.0
map kitty_mod+< change_font_size all -2.0
map kitty_mod+f change_font_size all 0
map kitty_mod+equal change_font_size all 0

# Scroll
map kitty_mod+up scroll_line_up
map kitty_mod+down scroll_line_down
map kitty_mod+page_up scroll_page_up
map kitty_mod+page_down scroll_page_down
map kitty_mod+home scroll_home
map kitty_mod+end scroll_end

# Navigation
map kitty_mod+[ next_tab
map kitty_mod+] previous_tab
map kitty_mod+t new_tab
map kitty_mod+w close_tab
map kitty_mod+f launch --location=hsplit
map kitty_mod+b launch --location=vsplit

# Copy/Paste
map kitty_mod+c copy_to_clipboard
map kitty_mod+v paste_from_clipboard
map kitty_mod+s show_scrollback

# Misc
map kitty_mod+enter new_window
map kitty_mod+n close_window
map kitty_mod+l next_window
map kitty_mod+h previous_window
map kitty_mod+e kitten hints

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”” Bell & Mouse
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

enable_audio_bell no
visual_bell_duration 0.3
window_alert_on_bell yes

mouse_hide_wait 3.0
focus_follows_mouse no
sync_to_monitor yes

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš€ Performance & Shell
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

repaint_delay 10
input_delay 3
sync_to_monitor yes

shell zsh
startup_session tmux

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¯ Advanced Features

# Tab bar separation
tab_separator " â”‡ "

# URL Hints
kitten hints hints --regex '\b\w+://\S+' --program @

# Image Preview
map ctrl+shift+p kitten icat

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸŒˆ Terminal Features

term xterm-256color
allow_remote_control yes
listen_on unix:/tmp/kitty

# Disable confirmation dialogs
confirm_os_window_close 0
hide_window_decorations yes
remember_window_size yes
initial_window_width 120
initial_window_height 40

   371â†’# ğŸ“ Useful Functions
   372â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   373â†’
   374â†’# Create directory and enter it
   375â†’mkcd() {
   376â†’    mkdir -p "$1" && cd "$1"
   377â†’}
   378â†’
   379â†’# Extract any archive
   380â†’extract() {
   381â†’    if [ -f "$1" ]; then
   382â†’        case "$1" in
   383â†’            *.tar.bz2)   tar xjf "$1"   ;;
   384â†’            *.tar.gz)    tar xzf "$1"   ;;
   385â†’            *.bz2)       bunzip2 "$1"   ;;
   386â†’            *.rar)       unrar x "$1"   ;;
   387â†’            *.gz)        gunzip "$1"    ;;
   388â†’            *.tar)       tar xf "$1"    ;;
   389â†’            *.tbz2)      tar xjf "$1"   ;;
   390â†’            *.tgz)       tar xzf "$1"   ;;
   391â†’            *.zip)       unzip "$1"     ;;
   392â†’            *.Z)         uncompress "$1";;
   393â†’            *.7z)        7z x "$1"      ;;
   394â†’            *)           echo "'$1' cannot be extracted via extract()" ;;
   395â†’        esac
   396â†’    else
   397â†’        echo "'$1' is not a valid file"
   398â†’    fi
   399â†’}
   400â†’
   401â†’# Git branch fuzzy search
   402â†’gbr() {
   403â†’    git branch | fzf | xargs git checkout
   404â†’}
   405â†’
   406â†’# Search git commits and show details
   407â†’glof() {
   408â†’    git log --all --oneline --graph | fzf --preview 'echo {} | grep -o "[a-f0-9]\{7\}" | xargs -I % git show --stat %'
   409â†’}
   410â†’
   411â†’# Kill process fuzzy search
   412â†’k9() {
   413â†’    ps aux | fzf | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
   414â†’}
   415â†’
   416â†’# Create a backup
   417â†’backup() {
   418â†’    cp "$1" "$1.bak"
   419â†’}
   420â†’
   421â†’# Get public IP
   422â†’myip() {
   423â†’    curl -s https://api.ipify.org
   424â†’    echo
   425â†’}
   426â†’
   427â†’# Weather report
   428â†’weather() {
   429â†’    curl -s "wttr.in/${1:-Sao Paulo}?format=3"
   430â†’}
   431â†’
   432â†’# Quick note
   433â†’note() {
   434â†’    echo "[$(date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S)] $*" >> ~/notes.txt
   435â†’}
   436â†’
   437â†’# Find files by name
   438â†’ff() {
   439â†’    find . -type f -iname "*$1*"
   440â†’}
   441â†’
   442â†’# Find text in files
   443â†’ft() {
   444â†’    grep -rI "$1" .
   445â†’}

   454â†’# Colorize man pages
   455â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_mb=$'\e[1;32m'
   456â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_md=$'\e[1;32m'
   457â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_me=$'\e[0m'
   458â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_se=$'\e[0m'
   459â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_so=$'\e[01;33m'
   460â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_ue=$'\e[0m'
   461â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_us=$'\e[1;4;31m'
   462â†’
   463â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   464â†’# ğŸ“¦ Tool-specific Configurations
   465â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   466â†’
   467â†’# Bat (cat replacement)
   468â†’export BAT_THEME='Catppuccin Mocha'
   469â†’export BAT_STYLE='plain'
   470â†’
   471â†’# Eza (ls replacement)
   472â†’export EZA_ICONS_AUTO=true
   473â†’
   474â†’# Tmux
   475â†’export TMUX_PLUGIN_MANAGER_PATH='~/.tmux/plugins'
   476â†’
   477â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   478â†’# ğŸ¯ Load local configurations
   479â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   480â†’
   481â†’if [[ -f ~/.zshrc.local ]]; then
   482â†’    source ~/.zshrc.local
   483â†’fi
   484â†’

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš€ Zsh Configuration - Modern & Fast Shell
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”§ Environment
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"
export EDITOR=nvim
export VISUAL=nvim
export PAGER=less
export LESS='-R -F -X'
export MANPAGER="sh -c 'col -bx | bat -l man -p'"

# Language & Locale
export LANG=pt_BR.UTF-8
export LC_ALL=pt_BR.UTF-8

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Starship Prompt
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

eval "$(starship init zsh)"

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Vi mode
bindkey -v
export KEYTIMEOUT=1

# Better navigation
bindkey '^L' vi-forward-word
bindkey '^H' vi-backward-word
bindkey '^k' up-line-or-search
bindkey '^j' down-line-or-search
bindkey '^a' beginning-of-line
bindkey '^e' end-of-line
bindkey '^f' forward-char
bindkey '^b' backward-char

# Edit command line in nvim
autoload -U edit-command-line
zle -N edit-command-line
bindkey '^v' edit-command-line

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ” Completion
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

setopt prompt_subst
zstyle ':completion:*' matcher-list 'm:{a-z}={A-Za-z}'
zstyle ':completion:*' list-colors ''
zstyle ':completion:*' menu select
zstyle ':completion:*' group-name ''
zstyle ':completion:*' verbose yes
zstyle ':completion:*:descriptions' format '%F{yellow}%B%d%b%f'
zstyle ':completion:*:warnings' format '%F{red}No matches for:%f %d'
zstyle ':completion:*' accept-exact '*(N)'
zstyle ':completion:*' use-cache on
zstyle ':completion:*' cache-path ~/.zcompcache

autoload bashcompinit && bashcompinit
autoload -Uz compinit
compinit

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“œ History
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

export HISTSIZE=100000
export SAVEHIST=100000
export HISTCONTROL=ignoredups
setopt HIST_IGNORE_DUPS
setopt HIST_IGNORE_ALL_DUPS
setopt SHARE_HISTORY
setopt HIST_REDUCE_BLANKS
setopt EXTENDED_HISTORY
setopt HIST_FIND_NO_DUPS
setopt HIST_SAVE_NO_DUPS

HISTFILE=~/.zsh_history

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš¦ Options
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

setopt auto_cd
setopt auto_pushd
setopt pushd_ignore_dups
setopt pushd_silent
setopt correct
setopt correct_all
setopt long_list_jobs
setopt multios
setopt notify
setopt hash_list_all
setopt complete_in_word
setopt always_to_end
setopt glob_complete
setopt extended_glob
setopt nomatch

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”Œ Plugins
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Zsh Autosuggestions
if [[ -f ~/.zsh/zsh-autosuggestions/zsh-autosuggestions.zsh ]]; then
  source ~/.zsh/zsh-autosuggestions/zsh-autosuggestions.zsh
  ZSH_AUTOSUGGEST_HIGHLIGHT_STYLE="fg=#6c7086"
  bindkey '^ ' autosuggest-accept
fi

# Zsh Syntax Highlighting
if [[ -f ~/.zsh/zsh-syntax-highlighting/zsh-syntax-highlighting.zsh ]]; then
  source ~/.zsh/zsh-syntax-highlighting/zsh-syntax-highlighting.zsh
fi

# Zoxide (smart cd)
eval "$(zoxide init zsh)"

# Direnv
eval "$(direnv hook zsh)"

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“¦ Tmux Auto-start
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

if [ -z "$TMUX" ] && [ "$TERM" != "linux" ]; then
    tmux new-session -A -s main 2>/dev/null || zsh
fi

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¯ FZF Configuration
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

export FZF_DEFAULT_COMMAND='fd --type f --hidden --follow --exclude .git --exclude node_modules'
export FZF_CTRL_T_COMMAND="$FZF_DEFAULT_COMMAND"
export FZF_DEFAULT_OPTS='--height 50% --layout=reverse --border --cycle --color=dark'
export FZF_COMPLETION_TRIGGER='**'
[ -f ~/.fzf.zsh ] && source ~/.fzf.zsh

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“‹ Aliases
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ§ System Aliases
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

alias cl='clear'
alias cls='clear && ls'
alias c='clear'
alias q='exit'
alias h='history'
alias hc='history -c'
alias zshrc='nvim ~/.zshrc'
alias szsh='source ~/.zshrc'
alias nvimrc='nvim ~/.config/nvim/init.lua'
alias kittyrc='nvim ~/.config/kitty/kitty.conf'
alias tmuxrc='nvim ~/.config/tmux/tmux.conf'
alias starshrc='nvim ~/.config/starship.toml'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“ Navigation Aliases (eza)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

alias la='eza -la --icons --git'
alias ll='eza -l --icons --git'
alias ls='eza --icons'
alias lt='eza --tree --level=2 --long --icons --git'
alias ltree='eza --tree --level=2 --icons --git'
alias l.='eza -la --icons --git | grep "^\."'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”™ Back Navigation
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

alias ..="cd .."
alias ...="cd ../.."
alias ....="cd ../../.."
alias .....="cd ../../../.."
alias ......="cd ../../../../.."
alias cd..='cd ..'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“Š System Info
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

alias df='df -h'
alias du='du -h'
alias free='free -h'
alias top='htop'
alias psg='ps aux | grep -i'
alias ports='netstat -tunlp'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“ File Operations
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

alias mkdir='mkdir -p'
alias cp='cp -iv'
alias mv='mv -iv'
alias rm='rm -iv'
alias cat='bat --style=plain'
alias grep='grep --color=auto'
alias egrep='egrep --color=auto'
alias fgrep='fgrep --color=auto'
alias wget='wget -c'
alias curl='curl -L'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸŒ Git Aliases
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

alias g='git'
alias ga='git add'
alias gaa='git add --all'
alias gap='git add -p'
alias gau='git add --update'
alias gb='git branch'
alias gba='git branch -a'
alias gbd='git branch -d'
alias gbD='git branch -D'
alias gbl='git blame -b -w'
alias gbs='git bisect'
alias gbsb='git bisect bad'
alias gbsg='git bisect good'
alias gbsr='git bisect reset'
alias gbss='git bisect start'
alias gc='git commit -v'
alias gc!='git commit -v --amend'
alias gca='git commit -v -a'
alias gca!='git commit -v -a --amend'
alias gcan!='git commit -v -a --no-edit --amend'
alias gcam='git commit -a -m'
alias gcb='git checkout -b'
alias gcf='git config --list'
alias gcl='git clone --recurse-submodules'
alias gclean='git clean -fd'
alias gcm='git checkout main'
alias gco='git checkout'
alias gcount='git shortlog -sn'
alias gcp='git cherry-pick'
alias gcpa='git cherry-pick --abort'
alias gcpc='git cherry-pick --continue'
alias gcs='git commit -S'
alias gd='git diff'
alias gdca='git diff --cached'
alias gds='git diff --staged'
alias gf='git fetch'
alias gfa='git fetch --all --tags --prune'
alias gfo='git fetch origin'
alias gg='git gui citool'
alias gga='git gui citool --amend'
alias ghh='git help'
alias gignore='git update-index --assume-unchanged'
alias gignored='git ls-files -v | grep "^[[:lower:]]"'
alias gk='gitk --all --branches'
alias gl='git pull'
alias glg='git log --stat'
alias glgg='git log --graph'
alias glgga='git log --graph --decorate --all'
alias glo='git log --oneline --decorate'
alias glog='git log --oneline --decorate --graph'
alias gloo='git log --graph --pretty=format:"%Cred%h%Creset -%C(yellow)%d%Creset %s %Cgreen(%cr) %C(bold blue)<%an>%Creset" --abbrev-commit'
alias gm='git merge'
alias gma='git merge --abort'
alias gmom='git merge origin/main'
alias gmt='git mergetool --no-prompt'
alias gmtvim='git mergetool --no-prompt --tool=vimdiff'
alias gp='git push'
alias gpd='git push --dry-run'
alias gpf='git push --force-with-lease'
alias gpoat='git push origin --all && git push origin --tags'
alias gpr='git pull --rebase'
alias gpu='git push upstream'
alias gpv='git push -v'
alias gr='git remote'
alias gra='git remote add'
alias grb='git rebase'

# ğŸ” Search & Find
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# fd (better find)
alias fd='fd --hidden --follow --exclude .git --exclude node_modules'

# ripgrep
alias rg='rg --hidden --glob "!.git"'

# find with ripgrep
alias findfile='fd'
alias findtext='rg'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“ Useful Functions
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Create directory and enter it
mkcd() {
    mkdir -p "$1" && cd "$1"
}

# Extract any archive
extract() {
    if [ -f "$1" ]; then
        case "$1" in
            *.tar.bz2)   tar xjf "$1"   ;;
            *.tar.gz)    tar xzf "$1"   ;;
            *.bz2)       bunzip2 "$1"   ;;
            *.rar)       unrar x "$1"   ;;
            *.gz)        gunzip "$1"    ;;
            *.tar)       tar xf "$1"    ;;
            *.tbz2)      tar xjf "$1"   ;;
            *.tgz)       tar xzf "$1"   ;;
            *.zip)       unzip "$1"     ;;
            *.Z)         uncompress "$1";;
            *.7z)        7z x "$1"      ;;
            *)           echo "'$1' cannot be extracted via extract()" ;;
        esac
    else
        echo "'$1' is not a valid file"
    fi
}

# Git branch fuzzy search
gbr() {
    git branch | fzf | xargs git checkout
}

# Search git commits and show details
glof() {
    git log --all --oneline --graph | fzf --preview 'echo {} | grep -o "[a-f0-9]\{7\}" | xargs -I % git show --stat %'
}

# Kill process fuzzy search
k9() {
    ps aux | fzf | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
}

# Create a backup
backup() {
    cp "$1" "$1.bak"
}

# Get public IP
myip() {
    curl -s https://api.ipify.org
    echo
}

# Weather report
weather() {
    curl -s "wttr.in/${1:-Sao Paulo}?format=3"
}

# Quick note
note() {
    echo "[$(date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S)] $*" >> ~/notes.txt
}

# Find files by name
ff() {
    find . -type f -iname "*$1*"
}

# Find text in files
ft() {
    grep -rI "$1" .
}

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš€ Starship Prompt Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

"$schema" = 'https://starship.rs/config-schema.json'

format = """
[î‚¶](red)\
$os\
$username\
[î‚°](bg:peach fg:red)\
$directory\
[î‚°](bg:yellow fg:peach)\
$git_branch\
$git_status\
[î‚°](fg:yellow bg:green)\
$c\
$rust\
$golang\
$nodejs\
$python\
[î‚°](fg:green bg:sapphire)\
$docker_context\
$conda\
[î‚°](fg:sapphire bg:lavender)\
$time\
[î‚´ ](fg:lavender)\
$cmd_duration\
$line_break\
$character"""

palette = 'catppuccin_mocha'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[os]
disabled = false
style = "bg:red fg:crust"

[os.symbols]
Windows = "  "
Ubuntu = " ó°•ˆ"
SUSE = "ïŒ”"
Raspbian = "ó°¿"
Mint = "ó°£­"
Macos = " ó°€µ"
Manjaro = "ïŒ’"
Linux = "ó°Œ½"
Gentoo = "ó°£¨"
Fedora = "ó°£›"

CentOS = "ïŒ„"
Debian = "ó°£š"

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[username]
show_always = true
style_user = "bg:red fg:crust"
style_root = "bg:red fg:crust"
format = '[ $user ]($style)'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“ Directory Module
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[directory]
style = "bg:peach fg:crust"
format = "[ $path ]($style)"
truncation_length = 3
truncation_symbol = "â€¦/"
truncate_to_repo = false

[directory.substitutions]
"Documents" = " ó°ˆ™ "
"Downloads" = " ï€™ "
"Music" = " ó°š "
"Pictures" = " ï€¾ "
"Developer" = " ó°²‹ "
".config" = " î˜— "
"code" = " ó°²‹ "

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”§ Git Modules
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[git_branch]
symbol = " ï˜"
style = "bg:yellow"
format = '[[ $symbol $branch ](fg:crust bg:yellow)]($style)'

[git_status]
style = "bg:yellow"
format = '[[($all_status$ahead_behind )](fg:crust bg:yellow)]($style)'
ahead = 'â‡¡'
behind = 'â‡£'
diverged = 'â‡•'
conflicted = '!'
modified = '!'
deleted = 'âœ˜'
renamed = 'Â»'
staged = '+'
untracked = '?'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ Language Modules
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[nodejs]
symbol = " îœ˜"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['js', 'mjs', 'cjs', 'ts']
detect_files = ['package.json', '.node-version', '.nvmrc']
detect_folders = ['node_modules']

[c]
symbol = " î˜"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['c', 'h', 'cpp']
detect_files = ['CMakeLists.txt', 'Makefile', 'meson.build']

[rust]
symbol = " î¨"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['rs']
detect_files = ['Cargo.toml']

[golang]
symbol = " î˜§"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['go']
detect_files = ['go.mod', 'go.sum', 'go.work', 'glide.yaml']

[python]
symbol = " î˜†"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version)(\(#$virtualenv\)) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
pyenv_version_name = true
python_binary = ['python3', 'python', 'python2']
detect_extensions = ['py']
detect_files = ['.python-version', 'Pipfile', 'tox.ini', 'setup.py', 'requirements.txt', 'pyproject.toml']

[java]
symbol = " î‰–"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['java', 'class', 'jar', 'gradle', 'clj', 'cljc']
detect_files = ['pom.xml', 'build.gradle', 'settings.gradle']

[kotlin]
symbol = " î˜´"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['kt', 'kts']
detect_files = ['build.gradle.kts', 'build.kts']

[haskell]
symbol = " î˜Ÿ"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['hs', 'lhs']
detect_files = ['stack.yaml', 'cabal.project', 'package.yaml']

[php]
symbol = " î˜ˆ"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['php']
detect_files = ['composer.json']

[docker_context]
symbol = " ïŒˆ"
style = "bg:sapphire"
format = '[[ $symbol( $context) ](fg:crust bg:sapphire)]($style)'
detect_files = ['docker-compose.yml', 'docker-compose.yaml', 'Dockerfile']
detect_extensions = ['Dockerfile']

[conda]
symbol = " ï„Œ "
style = "fg:crust bg:sapphire"
format = '[$symbol$environment ]($style)'
ignore_base = false
detect_files = ['environment.yml', 'environment.yaml']

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[line_break]

[cmd_duration]

[shlvl]

repeat = true
format = '[$shlvl]($style)'
threshold = 2

[hostname]
disabled = true
ssh_only = true
format = '@[$hostname]($style)'
style = 'bg:lavender fg:crust'

[localip]
disabled = true
ssh_only = true
format = '@[$localipv4]($style)'
style = 'bg:lavender fg:crust'

[status]
disabled = true
format = '[$status]($style) '
symbol = ' '

signal_symbol = ' '
map_symbol = true

[memory_usage]
disabled = true
symbol = ' '
threshold = 75
format = '$symbol[$ram( | $swap)]($style) '

[package]
disabled = false
symbol = ' '
format = 'is [$symbol$version]($style) '
display_private = false

[vcsh]
disabled = true
symbol = ' '
style = 'bg:lavender fg:crust'
format = '[$symbol $repo]($style)'

Agora tenho uma boa compreensÃ£o das configuraÃ§Ãµes do usuÃ¡rio. Vou analisar o que precisa ser ajustado:

**AnÃ¡lise do estado atual:**

1. **Kitty** - Linha 159 tem `startup_session tmux` que inicia o tmux automaticamente. O usuÃ¡rio quer que nÃ£o inicie automaticamente.
   - O kitty tambÃ©m tem efeitos visuais como cursor trail (linhas 20-21)

2. **Zsh** - Linhas 132-134 iniciam o tmux automaticamente se nÃ£o estiver em uma sessÃ£o tmux. O usuÃ¡rio quer que nÃ£o inicie automaticamente.

3. **Tmux** - EstÃ¡ muito bÃ¡sico, apenas configurando zsh como shell padrÃ£o. Precisa adicionar:
   - TPM (Plugin Manager)
   - Catppuccin theme
   - Plugins Ãºteis
   - Status line na parte superior

4. **Neovim** - Preciso ler o arquivo init.lua para revisar e encontrar erros.

5. **Efeitos do kitty** - O usuÃ¡rio quer efeitos. O kitty jÃ¡ tem alguns efeitos como cursor_trail, mas podemos adicionar mais.

Vou criar um todo list e comeÃ§ar a fazer as alteraÃ§Ãµes necessÃ¡rias.

local lazypath = vim.fn.stdpath('data') .. '/lazy/lazy.nvim'
if not vim.loop.fs_stat(lazypath) then
  vim.fn.system({
    'git',
    'clone',
    '--filter=blob:none',
    'https://github.com/folke/lazy.nvim.git',
    '--branch=stable',
    lazypath,
  })
end
vim.opt.rtp:prepend(lazypath)

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸ“Š Status Line (Lualine)

  {
    'nvim-lualine/lualine.nvim',
    event = 'VeryLazy',
    dependencies = { 'nvim-tree/nvim-web-devicons' },
    config = function()
      require('lualine').setup({
        options = {
          theme = 'catppuccin',
          globalstatus = true,
          component_separators = { left = 'â”‚', right = 'â”‚' },
          section_separators = { left = '', right = '' },
          disabled_filetypes = {
            statusline = {},
            winbar = {},
          },
        },
        sections = {
          lualine_a = { 'mode' },
          lualine_b = { 'branch', 'diff', 'diagnostics' },
          lualine_c = {
            {
              'filename',
              path = 1,
              symbols = {
                modified = 'â—',
                readonly = 'ğŸ”’',
                unnamed = '[No Name]',
              },
            },
          },
          lualine_x = {
            {
              'filetype',
              icon_only = true,
              separator = '',
              padding = { left = 1, right = 0 },
            },
            'encoding',
            'fileformat',
          },
          lualine_y = { 'progress' },
          lualine_z = { 'location' },
        },
      })

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸ” Fuzzy Finder (Telescope)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'nvim-telescope/telescope.nvim',
    cmd = 'Telescope',
    version = false,
    dependencies = {
      'nvim-lua/plenary.nvim',
      {
        'nvim-telescope/telescope-fzf-native.nvim',
        build = 'make',
      },
    },
    keys = {
      { '<leader>ff', '<cmd>Telescope find_files<cr>', desc = 'Find files' },
      { '<leader>fg', '<cmd>Telescope live_grep<cr>', desc = 'Live grep' },
      { '<leader>fb', '<cmd>Telescope buffers<cr>', desc = 'Buffers' },
      { '<leader>fh', '<cmd>Telescope help_tags<cr>', desc = 'Help tags' },
      { '<leader>fc', '<cmd>Telescope commands<cr>', desc = 'Commands' },
      { '<leader>fr', '<cmd>Telescope oldfiles<cr>', desc = 'Recent files' },
      { '<leader>fs', '<cmd>Telescope grep_string<cr>', desc = 'Grep string' },
    },
    config = function()
      local telescope = require('telescope')
      telescope.setup({
        defaults = {
          prompt_prefix = 'ğŸ” ',
          selection_caret = 'â¯ ',
          path_display = { 'truncate' },
          sorting_strategy = 'ascending',
          layout_config = {
            horizontal = {
              prompt_position = 'top',
              preview_width = 0.55,
            },
            vertical = {
              mirror = false,
            },
          },
        },
      })
      telescope.load_extension('fzf')
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸŒ³ Syntax Highlighting (Treesitter)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'nvim-treesitter/nvim-treesitter',
    build = ':TSUpdate',
    event = { 'BufReadPost', 'BufNewFile' },
    config = function()
      require('nvim-treesitter.configs').setup({
        ensure_installed = {
          'bash',
          'c',
          'cpp',
          'html',
          'css',
          'javascript',
          'typescript',
          'tsx',
          'json',
          'lua',
          'luadoc',
          'luap',
          'markdown',
          'markdown_inline',
          'python',
          'query',
          'regex',
          'vim',
          'vimdoc',
          'yaml',
          'go',
          'rust',
          'toml',
        },
        highlight = {
          enable = true,
          disable = function(_, buf)
            local max_filesize = 100 * 1024
            local ok, stats = pcall(vim.loop.fs_stat, vim.api.nvim_buf_get_name(buf))
            if ok and stats and stats.size > max_filesize then
              return true
            end
          end,
        },
        indent = { enable = true },
        autotag = { enable = true },
      })
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸ”Œ LSP Configuration
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'neovim/nvim-lspconfig',
    event = { 'BufReadPre', 'BufNewFile' },
    dependencies = {
      'williamboman/mason.nvim',
      'williamboman/mason-lspconfig.nvim',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-nvim-lsp',
      'folke/neodev.nvim',
    },
    config = function()
      local lspconfig = require('lspconfig')
      local mason = require('mason')
      local mason_lspconfig = require('mason-lspconfig')

      mason.setup({
        ui = {
          border = 'rounded',
          icons = {
            package_installed = 'âœ“',
            package_pending = 'âœ',
            package_uninstalled = 'âœ—',
          },
        },
      })

      mason_lspconfig.setup({
        ensure_installed = {
          'lua_ls',
          'pyright',
          'ts_ls',
          'rust_analyzer',
          'gopls',
          'html',
          'cssls',
          'jsonls',
          'yamlls',
          'bashls',
        },
        automatic_installation = true,
      })

      local capabilities = vim.lsp.protocol.make_client_capabilities()
      capabilities = require('cmp_nvim_lsp').default_capabilities(capabilities)

      local on_attach = function(client, bufnr)
        local opts = { buffer = bufnr, silent = true }
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gd', vim.lsp.buf.declaration, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gD', vim.lsp.buf.definition, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'K', vim.lsp.buf.hover, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gi', vim.lsp.buf.implementation, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gr', vim.lsp.buf.references, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gs', vim.lsp.buf.signature_help, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>rn', vim.lsp.buf.rename, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>ca', vim.lsp.buf.code_action, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>f', function()
          vim.lsp.buf.format({ async = true })
        end, opts)
      end

      mason_lspconfig.setup_handlers({
        function(server_name)
          lspconfig[server_name].setup({
            capabilities = capabilities,
            on_attach = on_attach,
          })
        end,
      })

      require('neodev').setup({})
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸ’¡ Auto Completion (nvim-cmp)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'hrsh7th/nvim-cmp',
    event = 'InsertEnter',
    dependencies = {
      'hrsh7th/cmp-nvim-lsp',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-path',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-buffer',
      'L3MON4D3/LuaSnip',
      'saadparwaiz1/cmp_luasnip',
      'rafamadriz/friendly-snippets',
    },
    config = function()
      local cmp = require('cmp')
      local luasnip = require('luasnip')

      require('luasnip.loaders.from_vscode').lazy_load()

      cmp.setup({
        snippet = {
          expand = function(args)
            luasnip.lsp_expand(args.body)
          end,
        },
        mapping = cmp.mapping.preset.insert({
          ['<C-b>'] = cmp.mapping.scroll_docs(-4),
          ['<C-f>'] = cmp.mapping.scroll_docs(4),
          ['<C-Space>'] = cmp.mapping.complete(),
          ['<C-e>'] = cmp.mapping.abort(),
          ['<CR>'] = cmp.mapping.confirm({ behavior = cmp.ConfirmBehavior.Replace, select = true }),
          ['<Tab>'] = cmp.mapping(function(fallback)
            if cmp.visible() then
              cmp.select_next_item()
            elseif luasnip.expand_or_jumpable() then
              luasnip.expand_or_jump()
            else
              fallback()
            end
          end, { 'i', 's' }),
          ['<S-Tab>'] = cmp.mapping(function(fallback)
            if cmp.visible() then
              cmp.select_prev_item()
            elseif luasnip.jumpable(-1) then
              luasnip.jump(-1)
            else
              fallback()
            end
          end, { 'i', 's' }),
        }),
        sources = cmp.config.sources({
          { name = 'nvim_lsp' },
          { name = 'luasnip' },
          { name = 'path' },
        }, {
          { name = 'buffer' },
        }),
        formatting = {
          format = function(entry, vim_item)
            vim_item.menu = ({
              nvim_lsp = '[LSP]',
              luasnip = '[Snippet]',
              buffer = '[Buffer]',
              path = '[Path]',
            })[entry.source.name]
            return vim_item
          end,
        },
      })
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

      require('nvim-tree').setup({

  -- ğŸŒ¿ Git Integration (gitsigns)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'lewis6991/gitsigns.nvim',
    event = { 'BufReadPre', 'BufNewFile' },
    config = function()
      require('gitsigns').setup({
        signs = {
          add = { text = 'â”‚' },
          change = { text = 'â”‚' },
          delete = { text = '_' },
          topdelete = { text = 'â€¾' },
          changedelete = { text = '~' },
        },
        on_attach = function(bufnr)
          local gs = package.loaded.gitsigns
          local function map(mode, l, r, opts)
            opts = opts or {}
            opts.buffer = bufnr
            vim.keymap.set(mode, l, r, opts)
          end
          map('n', ']c', function()
            if vim.wo.diff then
              return ']c'
            end
            vim.schedule(function()
              gs.next_hunk()
            end)
            return '<Ignore>'
          end, { expr = true })

          map('n', '[c', function()
            if vim.wo.diff then
              return '[c'
            end
            vim.schedule(function()
              gs.prev_hunk()
            end)
            return '<Ignore>'
          end, { expr = true })
        end,
      })
    end,
  },

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ± Kitty Terminal Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Fontes
font_family FiraCode Nerd Font
bold_font FiraCode Nerd Font Bold
italic_font FiraCode Nerd Font Italic
bold_italic_font FiraCode Nerd Font Bold Italic
font_size 12.0

# Ligaduras e Cursor
disable_ligatures never
cursor_shape block
cursor_blink_interval 0.5
cursor_beam_thickness 1.5
cursor_underline_thickness 1.5

# Cursor Trail Effect
cursor_trail_step 0.5
cursor_trail_decay 0.1 0.4

# Scrollback
scrollback_lines 10000
scrollback_pager less --chop-long-lines --RAW-CONTROL-CHARS +INPUT_LINE_NUMBER

# Layouts
enabled_layouts tall:bias=70;fat:bias=70;grid;stack;split

# Tab Bar
tab_bar_edge bottom
tab_bar_style powerline
tab_powerline_style slanted
tab_title_template "{index}:{fmt.bold}{title}"
active_tab_font_style bold
inactive_tab_font_style normal

# Background & Opacity
background_opacity 0.90
dynamic_background_opacity yes

# ğŸ–¼ï¸ Window & Borders
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

window_margin_width 8
window_padding_width 8
window_border_width 2
draw_minimal_borders yes

active_border_color #cba6f7
inactive_border_color #45475a
bell_border_color #f38ba8

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Modifiers
kitty_mod ctrl+shift

# Splits
map kitty_mod+v split_window --vertical
map kitty_mod+s split_window --horizontal

# Layouts
map kitty_mod+next_layout next_layout

# Resize
map kitty_mod+> change_font_size all +2.0
map kitty_mod+< change_font_size all -2.0
map kitty_mod+f change_font_size all 0
map kitty_mod+equal change_font_size all 0

# Scroll
map kitty_mod+up scroll_line_up
map kitty_mod+down scroll_line_down
map kitty_mod+page_up scroll_page_up
map kitty_mod+page_down scroll_page_down
map kitty_mod+home scroll_home
map kitty_mod+end scroll_end

# Navigation
map kitty_mod+[ next_tab
map kitty_mod+] previous_tab
map kitty_mod+t new_tab
map kitty_mod+w close_tab
map kitty_mod+f launch --location=hsplit
map kitty_mod+b launch --location=vsplit

# Copy/Paste
map kitty_mod+c copy_to_clipboard
map kitty_mod+v paste_from_clipboard
map kitty_mod+s show_scrollback

# Misc
map kitty_mod+enter new_window
map kitty_mod+n close_window
map kitty_mod+l next_window
map kitty_mod+h previous_window
map kitty_mod+e kitten hints

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”” Bell & Mouse
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

enable_audio_bell no
visual_bell_duration 0.3
window_alert_on_bell yes

mouse_hide_wait 3.0
focus_follows_mouse no
sync_to_monitor yes

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš€ Performance & Shell
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

repaint_delay 10
input_delay 3
sync_to_monitor yes

shell zsh
startup_session tmux

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Tab bar separation
tab_separator " â”‡ "

# URL Hints
kitten hints hints --regex '\b\w+://\S+' --program @

# Image Preview
map ctrl+shift+p kitten icat

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸŒˆ Terminal Features
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

term xterm-256color
allow_remote_control yes
listen_on unix:/tmp/kitty

# Disable confirmation dialogs
confirm_os_window_close 0
hide_window_decorations yes
remember_window_size yes
initial_window_width 120
initial_window_height 40

# ğŸ± Kitty Terminal Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Fontes
font_family FiraCode Nerd Font
bold_font FiraCode Nerd Font Bold
italic_font FiraCode Nerd Font Italic
bold_italic_font FiraCode Nerd Font Bold Italic
font_size 12.0

# Ligaduras e Cursor
disable_ligatures never
cursor_shape block
cursor_blink_interval 0.5
cursor_beam_thickness 1.5
cursor_underline_thickness 1.5

# Cursor Trail Effect
cursor_trail_step 0.5
cursor_trail_decay 0.1 0.4

# Scrollback
scrollback_lines 10000
scrollback_pager less --chop-long-lines --RAW-CONTROL-CHARS +INPUT_LINE_NUMBER

# Layouts
enabled_layouts tall:bias=70;fat:bias=70;grid;stack;split

# Tab Bar
tab_bar_edge bottom
tab_bar_style powerline
tab_powerline_style slanted
tab_title_template "{index}:{fmt.bold}{title}"
active_tab_font_style bold
inactive_tab_font_style normal

# Background & Opacity
background_opacity 0.90
dynamic_background_opacity yes

# ğŸ”§ Environment
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"
export EDITOR=nvim
export VISUAL=nvim
export PAGER=less
export LESS='-R -F -X'
export MANPAGER="sh -c 'col -bx | bat -l man -p'"

# Language & Locale
export LANG=pt_BR.UTF-8
export LC_ALL=pt_BR.UTF-8

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Starship Prompt
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

eval "$(starship init zsh)"

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Vi mode
bindkey -v
export KEYTIMEOUT=1

# Better navigation
bindkey '^L' vi-forward-word
bindkey '^H' vi-backward-word
bindkey '^k' up-line-or-search
bindkey '^j' down-line-or-search
bindkey '^a' beginning-of-line
bindkey '^e' end-of-line
bindkey '^f' forward-char
bindkey '^b' backward-char

# Edit command line in nvim
autoload -U edit-command-line
zle -N edit-command-line
bindkey '^v' edit-command-line

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ” Completion
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

setopt prompt_subst
zstyle ':completion:*' matcher-list 'm:{a-z}={A-Za-z}'
zstyle ':completion:*' list-colors ''
zstyle ':completion:*' menu select
zstyle ':completion:*' group-name ''
zstyle ':completion:*' verbose yes
zstyle ':completion:*:descriptions' format '%F{yellow}%B%d%b%f'
zstyle ':completion:*:warnings' format '%F{red}No matches for:%f %d'
zstyle ':completion:*' accept-exact '*(N)'
zstyle ':completion:*' use-cache on
zstyle ':completion:*' cache-path ~/.zcompcache

autoload bashcompinit && bashcompinit
autoload -Uz compinit
compinit

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“œ History
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

export HISTSIZE=100000
export SAVEHIST=100000
export HISTCONTROL=ignoredups
setopt HIST_IGNORE_DUPS
setopt HIST_IGNORE_ALL_DUPS
setopt SHARE_HISTORY
setopt HIST_REDUCE_BLANKS
setopt EXTENDED_HISTORY
setopt HIST_FIND_NO_DUPS
setopt HIST_SAVE_NO_DUPS

HISTFILE=~/.zsh_history

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš¦ Options
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

setopt auto_cd
setopt auto_pushd
setopt pushd_ignore_dups
setopt pushd_silent
setopt correct
setopt correct_all
setopt long_list_jobs
setopt multios
setopt notify
setopt hash_list_all
setopt complete_in_word
setopt always_to_end
setopt glob_complete
setopt extended_glob
setopt nomatch

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”Œ Plugins
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Zsh Autosuggestions
if [[ -f ~/.zsh/zsh-autosuggestions/zsh-autosuggestions.zsh ]]; then
  source ~/.zsh/zsh-autosuggestions/zsh-autosuggestions.zsh
  ZSH_AUTOSUGGEST_HIGHLIGHT_STYLE="fg=#6c7086"
  bindkey '^ ' autosuggest-accept
fi

# Zsh Syntax Highlighting
if [[ -f ~/.zsh/zsh-syntax-highlighting/zsh-syntax-highlighting.zsh ]]; then
  source ~/.zsh/zsh-syntax-highlighting/zsh-syntax-highlighting.zsh
fi

# Zoxide (smart cd)
eval "$(zoxide init zsh)"

# Direnv
eval "$(direnv hook zsh)"

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

    tmux new-session -A -s main 2>/dev/null || zsh
fi

# ğŸ“ Useful Functions
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Create directory and enter it
mkcd() {
    mkdir -p "$1" && cd "$1"
}

# Extract any archive
extract() {
    if [ -f "$1" ]; then
        case "$1" in
            *.tar.bz2)   tar xjf "$1"   ;;
            *.tar.gz)    tar xzf "$1"   ;;
            *.bz2)       bunzip2 "$1"   ;;
            *.rar)       unrar x "$1"   ;;
            *.gz)        gunzip "$1"    ;;
            *.tar)       tar xf "$1"    ;;
            *.tbz2)      tar xjf "$1"   ;;
            *.tgz)       tar xzf "$1"   ;;
            *.zip)       unzip "$1"     ;;
            *.Z)         uncompress "$1";;
            *.7z)        7z x "$1"      ;;
            *)           echo "'$1' cannot be extracted via extract()" ;;
        esac
    else
        echo "'$1' is not a valid file"
    fi
}

# Git branch fuzzy search
gbr() {
    git branch | fzf | xargs git checkout
}

# Search git commits and show details
glof() {
    git log --all --oneline --graph | fzf --preview 'echo {} | grep -o "[a-f0-9]\{7\}" | xargs -I % git show --stat %'
}

# Kill process fuzzy search
k9() {
    ps aux | fzf | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
}

# Create a backup
backup() {
    cp "$1" "$1.bak"
}

# Get public IP
myip() {
    curl -s https://api.ipify.org
    echo
}

# Weather report
weather() {
    curl -s "wttr.in/${1:-Sao Paulo}?format=3"
}

# Quick note
note() {
    echo "[$(date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S)] $*" >> ~/notes.txt
}

# Find files by name
ff() {
    find . -type f -iname "*$1*"
}

# Find text in files
ft() {
    grep -rI "$1" .
}

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸªŸ Tmux Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”§ Basic Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Increase scrollback buffer size
set -g history-limit 50000

# Enable focus events
set -g focus-events on

# Super useful when using "grouped sessions" and multi-monitor setup
set-window-option -g aggressive-resize on

# Set default shell
set-option -g default-shell /usr/bin/zsh
set-option -g default-command /usr/bin/zsh

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Colors (Catppuccin Mocha)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

set -g default-terminal "tmux-256color"
set -ga terminal-overrides ",*256col*:Tc"
set -ga terminal-overrides '*:Ss=\E[%p1%dTc:Se=\E[2Tc'

# Catppuccin Mocha Color Palette
set -g @catppuccin_flavour 'mocha'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Set prefix to Ctrl-a (like GNU screen)
unbind C-b
set-option -g prefix C-a
bind-key C-a send-prefix

# Reload configuration
bind r source-file ~/.tmux.conf \; display "Config reloaded!"

# Split panes using | and -
bind | split-window -h -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind - split-window -v -c "#{pane_current_path}"
unbind '"'
unbind %

# Create new window in current path
bind c new-window -c "#{pane_current_path}"

# Navigate panes using vim-like keys
bind h select-pane -L
bind j select-pane -D
bind k select-pane -U
bind l select-pane -R

# Navigate windows
bind -r C-h previous-window
bind -r C-l next-window

# Resize panes
bind -r H resize-pane -L 5
bind -r J resize-pane -D 5
bind -r K resize-pane -U 5
bind -r L resize-pane -R 5

# Copy mode vi-style
setw -g mode-keys vi
bind -T copy-mode-vi v send -X begin-selection
bind -T copy-mode-vi y send-keys -X copy-pipe-and-cancel "xclip -in -selection clipboard"
bind P paste-buffer

# Mouse support
set -g mouse on

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“Š Status Bar (TOP position)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Position status bar at top
set-option -g status-position top

# Status bar update interval
set -g status-interval 1

# Longer status line
set -g status-left-length 100
set -g status-right-length 100

# Status bar style
set -g status-style "bg=#1e1e2e,fg=#cdd6f4"

# Left status: session name
set -g status-left "#[bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e,bold] #S #[bg=#45475a,fg=#cba6f7]#{?window_zoomed_flag,ğŸ” ,} "

# Right status: git, cpu, date, time
set -g status-right "#{E:@catppuccin_status_git}#[bg=#45475a,fg=#a6e3a1] #{cpu_icon} #{cpu_percentage} #[bg=#45475a,fg=#89b4fa]%Y-%m-%d #[bg=#89b4fa,fg=#1e1e2e,bold]%H:%M:%S "

# Window status
set -g window-status-format "#[bg=#45475a,fg=#cdd6f4] #I:#W "
set -g window-status-current-format "#[bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e,bold] #I:#W* "
set -g window-status-separator ""

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸªŸ Window & Pane Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Start window and pane numbering at 1
set -g base-index 1
setw -g pane-base-index 1

# Renumber windows when one is closed
set -g renumber-windows on

# Automatically rename windows
setw -g automatic-rename on

# Don't rename window automatically when running commands
setw -g allow-rename off

# Pane borders
set -g pane-border-style "fg=#45475a"
set -g pane-active-border-style "fg=#cba6f7"

# Pane indicator colors
set -g display-panes-colour "#45475a"
set -g display-panes-active-colour "#cba6f7"

# Message style
set -g message-style "bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e"
set -g message-command-style "bg=#45475a,fg=#cdd6f4"

# Mode style
set -g mode-style "bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e"

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”Œ TPM (Tmux Plugin Manager)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# List of plugins
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tpm'                # TPM itself
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-sensible'       # Sensible settings
set -g @plugin 'catppuccin/tmux'                 # Catppuccin theme
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-resurrect'     # Save/restore sessions
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-continuum'      # Auto-save/restore
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-yank'           # Copy to system clipboard
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-fzf'            # Fzf integration
set -g @plugin 'laktak/tmux-jump'                 # Jump to text

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¯ Plugin Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# tmux-resurrect settings
set -g @resurrect-capture-pane-contents 'on'
set -g @resurrect-strategy-nvim 'session'
set -g @resurrect-save-shell-history 'on'

# tmux-continuum settings
set -g @continuum-restore 'on'
set -g @continuum-save-interval '15'
set -g @continuum-boot 'on'
set -g @continuum-boot-options 'iterm'

# tmux-yank settings
set -g @yank_selection_mouse 'clipboard'  # or 'primary' or 'clipboard'
set -g @yank_action 'copy-pipe-no-clear'

# tmux-jump settings
set -g @jump-key 's'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš€ Initialize TPM
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Run TPM (keep this line at the very bottom)
run '~/.tmux/plugins/tpm/tpm'

# ğŸ”§ Basic Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Increase scrollback buffer size
set -g history-limit 50000

# Enable focus events
set -g focus-events on

# Super useful when using "grouped sessions" and multi-monitor setup
set-window-option -g aggressive-resize on

# Set default shell
set-option -g default-shell /usr/bin/zsh
set-option -g default-command /usr/bin/zsh

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Colors (Catppuccin Mocha)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

set -g default-terminal "tmux-256color"
set -ga terminal-overrides ",*256col*:Tc"
set -ga terminal-overrides '*:Ss=\E[%p1%dTc:Se=\E[2Tc'

# Catppuccin Mocha Color Palette
set -g @catppuccin_flavour 'mocha'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Set prefix to Ctrl-a (like GNU screen)
unbind C-b
set-option -g prefix C-a
bind-key C-a send-prefix

# Reload configuration
bind r source-file ~/.tmux.conf \; display "Config reloaded!"

# Split panes using | and -
bind | split-window -h -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind - split-window -v -c "#{pane_current_path}"
unbind '"'
unbind %

# Create new window in current path
bind c new-window -c "#{pane_current_path}"

# Navigate panes using vim-like keys
bind h select-pane -L
bind j select-pane -D
bind k select-pane -U
bind l select-pane -R

# Navigate windows
bind -r C-h previous-window
bind -r C-l next-window

# Resize panes
bind -r H resize-pane -L 5
bind -r J resize-pane -D 5
bind -r K resize-pane -U 5
bind -r L resize-pane -R 5

# Copy mode vi-style
setw -g mode-keys vi
bind -T copy-mode-vi v send -X begin-selection
bind -T copy-mode-vi y send-keys -X copy-pipe-and-cancel "xclip -in -selection clipboard"
bind P paste-buffer

# Mouse support
set -g mouse on

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“Š Status Bar (TOP position)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Position status bar at top
set-option -g status-position top

# Status bar update interval
set -g status-interval 1

# Longer status line
set -g status-left-length 100
set -g status-right-length 100

# Status bar style
set -g status-style "bg=#1e1e2e,fg=#cdd6f4"

# Left status: session name
set -g status-left "#[bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e,bold] #S #[bg=#45475a,fg=#cba6f7]#{?window_zoomed_flag,ğŸ” ,} "

# Right status: git, cpu, date, time
set -g status-right "#{E:@catppuccin_status_git}#[bg=#45475a,fg=#a6e3a1] #{cpu_icon} #{cpu_percentage} #[bg=#45475a,fg=#89b4fa]%Y-%m-%d #[bg=#89b4fa,fg=#1e1e2e,bold]%H:%M:%S "

# Window status
set -g window-status-format "#[bg=#45475a,fg=#cdd6f4] #I:#W "
set -g window-status-current-format "#[bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e,bold] #I:#W* "
set -g window-status-separator ""

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸªŸ Window & Pane Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Start window and pane numbering at 1
set -g base-index 1
setw -g pane-base-index 1

# Renumber windows when one is closed
set -g renumber-windows on

# Automatically rename windows
setw -g automatic-rename on

# Don't rename window automatically when running commands
setw -g allow-rename off

# Pane borders
set -g pane-border-style "fg=#45475a"
set -g pane-active-border-style "fg=#cba6f7"

# Pane indicator colors
set -g display-panes-colour "#45475a"
set -g display-panes-active-colour "#cba6f7"

# Message style
set -g message-style "bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e"
set -g message-command-style "bg=#45475a,fg=#cdd6f4"

# Mode style
set -g mode-style "bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e"

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”Œ TPM (Tmux Plugin Manager)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# List of plugins
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tpm'                # TPM itself
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-sensible'       # Sensible settings
set -g @plugin 'catppuccin/tmux'                 # Catppuccin theme
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-resurrect'     # Save/restore sessions
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-continuum'      # Auto-save/restore
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-yank'           # Copy to system clipboard
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-fzf'            # Fzf integration
set -g @plugin 'laktak/tmux-jump'                 # Jump to text

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¯ Plugin Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# tmux-resurrect settings
set -g @resurrect-capture-pane-contents 'on'
set -g @resurrect-strategy-nvim 'session'
set -g @resurrect-save-shell-history 'on'

# tmux-continuum settings
set -g @continuum-restore 'on'
set -g @continuum-save-interval '15'
set -g @continuum-boot 'on'
set -g @continuum-boot-options 'iterm'

# tmux-yank settings
set -g @yank_selection_mouse 'clipboard'  # or 'primary' or 'clipboard'
set -g @yank_action 'copy-pipe-no-clear'

# tmux-jump settings
set -g @jump-key 's'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš€ Initialize TPM
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Run TPM (keep this line at the very bottom)
run '~/.tmux/plugins/tpm/tpm'

content.thinking:
Agora vou revisar a configuraÃ§Ã£o do Neovim. JÃ¡ li o arquivo init.lua anteriormente. Vou analisÃ¡-lo novamente para encontrar possÃ­veis erros.

Analisando a configuraÃ§Ã£o do Neovim, vejo que ela estÃ¡ bem estruturada, mas hÃ¡ alguns problemas potenciais:

1. **Linha 503** - `local gs = package.loaded.gitsigns` - Isso pode causar um erro se gitsigns ainda nÃ£o foi carregado. Deveria ser `require('gitsigns')`.

2. **Linha 326** - `ts_ls` foi renomeado de `tsserver` recentemente, mas isso pode ser um problema se a versÃ£o do mason nÃ£o suportar.

3. **Linha 139** - `mini = false` nas integraÃ§Ãµes do catppuccin, mas depois nas linhas 539-549 Ã© usado `mini.nvim`. Isso pode nÃ£o ser um erro, mas pode causar problemas de integraÃ§Ã£o.

Vou fazer os ajustes necessÃ¡rios para corrigir esses problemas.

content.text: Analisando a configuraÃ§Ã£o do Neovim, encontrei alguns problemas. Vou corrigi-los:

input.old_string:
on_attach = function(bufnr)
          local gs = package.loaded.gitsigns
          local function map(mode, l, r, opts)
input.new_string:
on_attach = function(bufnr)
          local gs = require('gitsigns')
          local function map(mode, l, r, opts)

  {
    'nvim-treesitter/nvim-treesitter',
    build = ':TSUpdate',
    event = { 'BufReadPost', 'BufNewFile' },
    config = function()
      require('nvim-treesitter.configs').setup({
        ensure_installed = {
          'bash',
          'c',
          'cpp',
          'html',
          'css',
          'javascript',
          'typescript',
          'tsx',
          'json',
          'lua',
          'luadoc',
          'luap',
          'markdown',
          'markdown_inline',
          'python',
          'query',
          'regex',
          'vim',
          'vimdoc',
          'yaml',
          'go',
          'rust',
          'toml',
        },
        highlight = {
          enable = true,
          disable = function(_, buf)
            local max_filesize = 100 * 1024
            local ok, stats = pcall(vim.loop.fs_stat, vim.api.nvim_buf_get_name(buf))
            if ok and stats and stats.size > max_filesize then
              return true
            end
          end,
        },
        indent = { enable = true },
        autotag = { enable = true },
      })
    end,
  },

  -- ğŸ”Œ LSP Configuration
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'neovim/nvim-lspconfig',
    event = { 'BufReadPre', 'BufNewFile' },
    dependencies = {
      'williamboman/mason.nvim',
      'williamboman/mason-lspconfig.nvim',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-nvim-lsp',
      'folke/neodev.nvim',
    },
    config = function()
      local lspconfig = require('lspconfig')
      local mason = require('mason')
      local mason_lspconfig = require('mason-lspconfig')

      mason.setup({
        ui = {
          border = 'rounded',
          icons = {
            package_installed = 'âœ“',
            package_pending = 'âœ',
            package_uninstalled = 'âœ—',
          },
        },
      })

      mason_lspconfig.setup({
        ensure_installed = {
          'lua_ls',
          'pyright',
          'ts_ls',
          'rust_analyzer',
          'gopls',
          'html',
          'cssls',
          'jsonls',
          'yamlls',
          'bashls',
        },
        automatic_installation = true,
      })

      local capabilities = vim.lsp.protocol.make_client_capabilities()
      capabilities = require('cmp_nvim_lsp').default_capabilities(capabilities)

      local on_attach = function(client, bufnr)
        local opts = { buffer = bufnr, silent = true }
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gd', vim.lsp.buf.declaration, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gD', vim.lsp.buf.definition, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'K', vim.lsp.buf.hover, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gi', vim.lsp.buf.implementation, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gr', vim.lsp.buf.references, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gs', vim.lsp.buf.signature_help, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>rn', vim.lsp.buf.rename, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>ca', vim.lsp.buf.code_action, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>f', function()
          vim.lsp.buf.format({ async = true })
        end, opts)
      end

      mason_lspconfig.setup_handlers({
        function(server_name)
          lspconfig[server_name].setup({
            capabilities = capabilities,
            on_attach = on_attach,
          })
        end,
      })

      require('neodev').setup({})
    end,
  },

  -- ğŸ’¡ Auto Completion (nvim-cmp)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'hrsh7th/nvim-cmp',
    event = 'InsertEnter',
    dependencies = {
      'hrsh7th/cmp-nvim-lsp',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-path',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-buffer',
      'L3MON4D3/LuaSnip',
      'saadparwaiz1/cmp_luasnip',
      'rafamadriz/friendly-snippets',
    },
    config = function()
      local cmp = require('cmp')
      local luasnip = require('luasnip')

      require('luasnip.loaders.from_vscode').lazy_load()

      cmp.setup({
        snippet = {
          expand = function(args)
            luasnip.lsp_expand(args.body)
          end,
        },
        mapping = cmp.mapping.preset.insert({
          ['<C-b>'] = cmp.mapping.scroll_docs(-4),
          ['<C-f>'] = cmp.mapping.scroll_docs(4),
          ['<C-Space>'] = cmp.mapping.complete(),
          ['<C-e>'] = cmp.mapping.abort(),
          ['<CR>'] = cmp.mapping.confirm({ behavior = cmp.ConfirmBehavior.Replace, select = true }),
          ['<Tab>'] = cmp.mapping(function(fallback)
            if cmp.visible() then
              cmp.select_next_item()
            elseif luasnip.expand_or_jumpable() then
              luasnip.expand_or_jump()
            else
              fallback()
            end
          end, { 'i', 's' }),
          ['<S-Tab>'] = cmp.mapping(function(fallback)
            if cmp.visible() then
              cmp.select_prev_item()
            elseif luasnip.jumpable(-1) then
              luasnip.jump(-1)
            else
              fallback()
            end
          end, { 'i', 's' }),
        }),
        sources = cmp.config.sources({
          { name = 'nvim_lsp' },
          { name = 'luasnip' },
          { name = 'path' },
        }, {
          { name = 'buffer' },
        }),
        formatting = {
          format = function(entry, vim_item)
            vim_item.menu = ({
              nvim_lsp = '[LSP]',
              luasnip = '[Snippet]',
              buffer = '[Buffer]',
              path = '[Path]',
            })[entry.source.name]
            return vim_item
          end,
        },
      })
    end,
  },

  -- ğŸŒ¿ Git Integration (gitsigns)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'lewis6991/gitsigns.nvim',
    event = { 'BufReadPre', 'BufNewFile' },
    config = function()
      require('gitsigns').setup({
        signs = {
          add = { text = 'â”‚' },
          change = { text = 'â”‚' },
          delete = { text = '_' },
          topdelete = { text = 'â€¾' },
          changedelete = { text = '~' },
        },
        on_attach = function(bufnr)
          local gs = package.loaded.gitsigns
          local function map(mode, l, r, opts)
            opts = opts or {}
            opts.buffer = bufnr
            vim.keymap.set(mode, l, r, opts)
          end
          map('n', ']c', function()
            if vim.wo.diff then
              return ']c'
            end
            vim.schedule(function()
              gs.next_hunk()
            end)
            return '<Ignore>'
          end, { expr = true })

          map('n', '[c', function()
            if vim.wo.diff then
              return '[c'
            end
            vim.schedule(function()
              gs.prev_hunk()
            end)
            return '<Ignore>'
          end, { expr = true })
        end,
      })
    end,
  },

  -- ğŸŒ³ Syntax Highlighting (Treesitter)

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸ”Œ LSP Configuration

  {
    'neovim/nvim-lspconfig',
    event = { 'BufReadPre', 'BufNewFile' },
    dependencies = {
      'williamboman/mason.nvim',
      'williamboman/mason-lspconfig.nvim',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-nvim-lsp',
      'folke/neodev.nvim',
    },
    config = function()
      local lspconfig = require('lspconfig')
      local mason = require('mason')
      local mason_lspconfig = require('mason-lspconfig')

      mason.setup({
        ui = {
          border = 'rounded',
          icons = {
            package_installed = 'âœ“',
            package_pending = 'âœ',
            package_uninstalled = 'âœ—',
          },
        },
      })

      mason_lspconfig.setup({
        ensure_installed = {
          'lua_ls',
          'pyright',
          'ts_ls',
          'rust_analyzer',
          'gopls',
          'html',
          'cssls',
          'jsonls',
          'yamlls',
          'bashls',
        },
        automatic_installation = true,
      })

      local capabilities = vim.lsp.protocol.make_client_capabilities()
      capabilities = require('cmp_nvim_lsp').default_capabilities(capabilities)

      local on_attach = function(client, bufnr)
        local opts = { buffer = bufnr, silent = true }
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gd', vim.lsp.buf.declaration, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gD', vim.lsp.buf.definition, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'K', vim.lsp.buf.hover, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gi', vim.lsp.buf.implementation, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gr', vim.lsp.buf.references, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gs', vim.lsp.buf.signature_help, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>rn', vim.lsp.buf.rename, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>ca', vim.lsp.buf.code_action, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>f', function()
          vim.lsp.buf.format({ async = true })
        end, opts)
      end

      mason_lspconfig.setup_handlers({
        function(server_name)
          lspconfig[server_name].setup({
            capabilities = capabilities,
            on_attach = on_attach,
          })
        end,
      })

      require('neodev').setup({})
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

  {
    'hrsh7th/nvim-cmp',
    event = 'InsertEnter',

      'hrsh7th/cmp-path',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-buffer',
      'L3MON4D3/LuaSnip',
      'saadparwaiz1/cmp_luasnip',
      'rafamadriz/friendly-snippets',
    },
    config = function()
      local cmp = require('cmp')
      local luasnip = require('luasnip')

      require('luasnip.loaders.from_vscode').lazy_load()

      cmp.setup({
        snippet = {
          expand = function(args)
            luasnip.lsp_expand(args.body)
          end,
        },
        mapping = cmp.mapping.preset.insert({
          ['<C-b>'] = cmp.mapping.scroll_docs(-4),
          ['<C-f>'] = cmp.mapping.scroll_docs(4),
          ['<C-Space>'] = cmp.mapping.complete(),
          ['<C-e>'] = cmp.mapping.abort(),
          ['<CR>'] = cmp.mapping.confirm({ behavior = cmp.ConfirmBehavior.Replace, select = true }),
          ['<Tab>'] = cmp.mapping(function(fallback)
            if cmp.visible() then
              cmp.select_next_item()
            elseif luasnip.expand_or_jumpable() then
              luasnip.expand_or_jump()
            else
              fallback()
            end
          end, { 'i', 's' }),
          ['<S-Tab>'] = cmp.mapping(function(fallback)
            if cmp.visible() then
              cmp.select_prev_item()
            elseif luasnip.jumpable(-1) then
              luasnip.jump(-1)
            else
              fallback()
            end
          end, { 'i', 's' }),
        }),
        sources = cmp.config.sources({
          { name = 'nvim_lsp' },
          { name = 'luasnip' },
          { name = 'path' },
        }, {
          { name = 'buffer' },
        }),
        formatting = {
          format = function(entry, vim_item)
            vim_item.menu = ({
              nvim_lsp = '[LSP]',
              luasnip = '[Snippet]',
              buffer = '[Buffer]',
              path = '[Path]',
            })[entry.source.name]
            return vim_item
          end,
        },
      })
    end,
  },

  -- ğŸŒ¿ Git Integration (gitsigns)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'lewis6991/gitsigns.nvim',
    event = { 'BufReadPre', 'BufNewFile' },
    config = function()
      require('gitsigns').setup({
        signs = {
          add = { text = 'â”‚' },
          change = { text = 'â”‚' },
          delete = { text = '_' },
          topdelete = { text = 'â€¾' },
          changedelete = { text = '~' },
        },
        on_attach = function(bufnr)
          local gs = require('gitsigns')
          local function map(mode, l, r, opts)
            opts = opts or {}
            opts.buffer = bufnr
            vim.keymap.set(mode, l, r, opts)
          end
          map('n', ']c', function()
            if vim.wo.diff then
              return ']c'
            end
            vim.schedule(function()
              gs.next_hunk()
            end)
            return '<Ignore>'
          end, { expr = true })

          map('n', '[c', function()
            if vim.wo.diff then
              return '[c'
            end
            vim.schedule(function()
              gs.prev_hunk()
            end)
            return '<Ignore>'
          end, { expr = true })
        end,
      })
    end,
  },

local lazypath = vim.fn.stdpath('data') .. '/lazy/lazy.nvim'
if not vim.loop.fs_stat(lazypath) then
  vim.fn.system({
    'git',
    'clone',
    '--filter=blob:none',
    'https://github.com/folke/lazy.nvim.git',
    '--branch=stable',
    lazypath,
  })
end
vim.opt.rtp:prepend(lazypath)

  {
    'nvim-treesitter/nvim-treesitter',
    build = ':TSUpdate',
    event = { 'BufReadPost', 'BufNewFile' },
    config = function()
      require('nvim-treesitter.configs').setup({
        ensure_installed = {
          'bash',
          'c',
          'cpp',
          'html',
          'css',
          'javascript',
          'typescript',
          'tsx',
          'json',
          'lua',
          'luadoc',
          'luap',
          'markdown',
          'markdown_inline',
          'python',
          'query',
          'regex',
          'vim',
          'vimdoc',
          'yaml',
          'go',
          'rust',
          'toml',
        },
        highlight = {
          enable = true,
          disable = function(_, buf)
            local max_filesize = 100 * 1024
            local ok, stats = pcall(vim.loop.fs_stat, vim.api.nvim_buf_get_name(buf))
            if ok and stats and stats.size > max_filesize then
              return true
            end
          end,
        },
        indent = { enable = true },
        autotag = { enable = true },
      })
    end,
  },
